programme.sub-title: Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL - Racing
programme.desc: A jam-packed Tampa stadium is on fire as ten of Monster Jam's trucks and drivers go head to head in racing action.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series Red returns to Houston as Adam Anderson continues to chip away at Camden Murphy’s series points lead. Will Bakugan Dragonoid remain on top or will Grave Digger regain the lead, and Tom Meents returns to the city where he debuted Max-D twenty years ago.

programme.desc: There's a big storm brewing in Jacksonville, but the only thunder comes from the monsters! This is Monster Jam freestyle from Alltel Stadium.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: World Finals XXII - Nissan Stadium - Nashville, TN
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to the Music City for the biggest event of the year, as the sports best and brightest compete at Monster Jam World Finals XXII in Nashville. Two World Champions will be crowned in the Great Clips Two Wheel Skills Challenge and BKT Racing when the action kicks off at Nissan Stadium.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East ends its Florida run on a mud filled track in Jacksonville. Tyler Menninga looks to mudslide the momentum from a perfect event in Orlando while Blake Granger rides his International Series success back home in the states as he pilots Max-D.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East slip-slides its way into Gillette Stadium as Bryce Kenny looks to launch Great Clips Mohawk Warrior to back-to-back freestyle wins, as Grave Digger’s Tyler Menninga hopes his competitors don’t rain on his parade to a sixth series title.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East rolls into upstate New York as Tyler Menninga attempts to clinch his second straight series title, while JCB Digatron’s Tristan England and Megalodon’s Todd LeDuc attempt to block Grave Digger from the series win.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East continues its tear through the sunshine state as Tyler Menninga attempts to drive Grave Digger to back-to-back event championships. Meanwhile, Tristan England is undefeated on the Ray-J racetrack and looks to pilot JCB Digatron to a perfect racing record as Monster Jam continues in Tampa.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: The fun continues in Miami, FL as your favorite Monster Jam trucks and drivers show off their motor skills at loanDepot Park.

programme.title: Monster Jam TV
programme.desc: Monster Jam's 2014 season at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, FL, featuring championship race and freestyle competitions.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Grave Digger’s Weston Anderson continues to lead the east series as the action heats up at the PPG Paints Arena in Pittsburgh. Monster Jam’s reigning Rookie of the Year will be challenged through four competitions by Bernard Lyght in Megalodon and Linsey Read piloting Scooby-Doo as they battle for the Overall Event Championship.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: Monster Jam’s 2022 season continues with round 5 of the Stadium Championship Series, in The Dome at America's Center in St. Louis, MO.
